Gautier Evennou

PhD blog on computer vision and academic life.

PhD student | IMATAG & IRISA / Inria Rennes

PhD candidate exploring image forensics, synthetic data, and trustworthy vision models.

About me

I am a PhD student working jointly with IMATAG and the Linkmedia team at IRISA / Inria Rennes. My research traces and explains manipulations in multimedia data.

I work with large vision-language models, image watermarking pipelines, and lightweight text autoencoders. The common thread is making edits explainable so creators and platforms can offer verifiable media.

I am advised by Vivien Chappelier and Ewa Kijak. Before my PhD I studied digital imaging engineering at Ecole Superieure d'Ingenieurs de Rennes.

    July 15, 2024 - Gautier Evennou, Vivien Chappelier and Ewa Kijak
